products.heroTitle: Compare Prices. Choose Smart. Build with Eva
products.heroDescription: Explore materials. Connect with Suppliers, and get the best deals
products.comparePricesDescription: Easily compare prices across multiple suppliers to ensure you get the best deals for your projects.
products.verifiedSuppliersDescription: All suppliers on our platform are thoroughly vetted to ensure quality products and reliable service.
products.professionalSupportDescription: Our dedicated team is available to assist you with any questions or issues throughout your buying journey.

supplierSection.findBestSuppliers: Find the best suppliers for your construction needs
supplierSection.noSuppliers: No suppliers available at the moment

whatAreCookies.title: What are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit our website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide useful information to website owners.

howWeUseCookies.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUseCookies.content: We use cookies for the following purposes:
list: Analytics cookies to understand how visitors use our site
Preference cookies to remember your settings
Marketing cookies to deliver relevant advertisements

managingCookies.title: Managing Cookies
managingCookies.content: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies that are already on your computer and you can set most browsers to prevent them from being placed.

informationWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:

howWeUseInformation.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUseInformation.content: We use the information we collect to:
list: Send you updates and marketing communications

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

agreementToTerms.title: Agreement to Terms
agreementToTerms.content: By accessing and using EVA ENGINEERING's services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations.

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.content: As a user of our platform, you agree to:
list: Maintain the security of your account

serviceModifications.title: Service Modifications
serviceModifications.content: We reserve the right to modify or discontinue our services at any time without notice.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: EVA ENGINEERING is dedicated to revolutionizing the construction and building materials industry by providing a comprehensive marketplace that connects suppliers with customers efficiently and effectively.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
list: Connects construction professionals with quality suppliers
Facilitates easy comparison of building materials
Ensures transparent pricing and quality standards

services.title: Our Services Are Getting Better
services.description: We're working hard to bring you an enhanced service experience. Stay tuned for exciting updates and new features that will transform how you manage your construction projects.

1.title: Enhanced Features
1.description: New tools and capabilities to streamline your workflow

2.title: Smart Solutions
2.description: Intelligent features to help you make better decisions

3.title: Better Integration
3.description: Seamless connection with your existing tools and systems
